A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie to date. Horrible plot filled with chaotic passing and boring characters. The The only story line that was interesting was neglected and ultimately ruined. At least Episode 1 had Darth Maul\, Pod racing\, and Qui Gon. This movie had almost nothing worthy of remembering.
